attributes.action: Allow the use of Mobile Phone Blockers in respected areas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
'Cell phone jamming equipment is illegal to use in the UK as it violates sections 1 & 13 of the 1949 telegraphy act'

Interesting! But I am sure, along with quiet a few other people, that this should be lifted in relevance to our children's education. I feel that this "antiquated" act should be revised for the use of Mobile Phone Blockers in educational facilities and respected public areas such as Hospitals, Cinemas, and Restaurants etc.
